subject: JUnit and RAD
msgSnippet: Hi All, Am new to JUnit and J2EE.Can anyone guide me how to add JUnit plug-in for RAD. I want to create JUnit test cases for the web application I built in RAD
messageBody:
Hi All,

Am new to JUnit and J2EE.Can anyone guide me how to add JUnit plug-in for RAD. I want to create JUnit test cases for the web application I built in RAD 6.0.

Thanks
Swetha
